Name: Connections
Description: Manages named connections in files and in memory.

Properties.Name: InMemory
Properties.Description: Contains all connections retreived or created to be in memory only.

Methods.Name: Exists
Methods.Description: Checks if a file exists for named connection

Methods.Name: Get
Methods.Description: Retrieves a connection either from in memobry of the file system.

Methods.Name: Set
Methods.Description: Saves a connection either in membory or on the file system.

Arguments.Name: IsPersisted
Arguments.Description: If true, the connection will be persisted to a file
